code: import*as ActionTypes from'./ActionTypes';import{baseUrl,backendUrl}from'../shared/urls';/* ----------------------------------- */export var fetchSpecialties=function fetchSpecialties(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(specialtiesLoading(true));return fetch(backendUrl+"posts?categories=43&_embed&per_page=100").then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response;}else{var error=new Error('Error '+response.status+': '+response.statusText);error.response=response;throw error;}},function(error){var errmess=new Error(error.message);throw errmess;}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(specialties){return dispatch(addSpecialties(specialties));}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(specialtiesFailed(error.message));});};};export var specialtiesLoading=function specialtiesLoading(){return{type:ActionTypes.SPECIALTIES_LOADING};};export var specialtiesFailed=function specialtiesFailed(errmess){return{type:ActionTypes.SPECIALTIES_FAILED,payload:errmess};};export var addSpecialties=function addSpecialties(specialties){return{type:ActionTypes.ADD_SPECIALTIES,payload:specialties};};/* ----------------------------------- */export var fetchPortfolio=function fetchPortfolio(){return portfolioLoading=function portfolioLoading(){return{type:ActionTypes.PORTFOLIO_LOADING};};export var portfolioFailed=function portfolioFailed(errmess){return{type:ActionTypes.PORTFOLIO_FAILED,payload:errmess};};export var addPortfolio=function addPortfolio(portfolio){return{type:ActionTypes.ADD_PORTFOLIO,payload:portfolio};};/* ----------------------------------- */export var fetchEducation=function fetchEducation(){return Error('Error '+response.status+': '+response.statusText);error.response=response;throw error;}},function(error){var errmess=new Error(error.message);throw errmess;}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(education){return dispatch(addEducation(education));}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(educationFailed(error.message));});};};export var educationLoading=function educationLoading(){return{type:ActionTypes.EDUCATION_LOADING};};export var educationFailed=function educationFailed(errmess){return{type:ActionTypes.EDUCATION_FAILED,payload:errmess};};export var addEducation=function function(dispatch){dispatch(recommendationsLoading(true));return fetch(backendUrl+"posts?categories=45&_embed&per_page=100").then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response;}else{var error=new addRecommendations(recommendations){return{type:ActionTypes.ADD_RECOMMENDATIONS,payload:recommendations};};/* ----------------------------------- */export var postFeedback=function postFeedback(firstname,lastname,telnum,email,agree,message){return function(dispatch){var newFeedback={firstname:firstname,lastname:lastname,telnum:telnum,email:email,agree:agree,message:message};newFeedback.date=new Date().toISOString();return fetch(baseUrl+'feedback',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(newFeedback),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},credentials:'same-origin'}).then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response;}else{var error=new Error('Error '+response.status+': '+response.statusText);error.response=response;throw error;}},function(error){var errmess=new Error(error.message);throw feedback could not be posted\nError: '+error.message);});};};export var addFeedback=function addFeedback(feedback){return{type:ActionTypes.ADD_FEEDBACK,payload:feedback};};export var feedbackFailed=function feedbackFailed(errmess){return{type:ActionTypes.FEEDBACK_FAILED,payload:errmess};};
